definition: to lease/to hire/to rent (sth from sb)
to hire/to rent/to charter/to rent out/to lease out/rent/land tax
to use/to employ/to have to/to eat or drink/expense or outlay/usefulness/hence/therefore

sentences.english: However, in 1985, a leasing system was introduced.
sentences.chinese: 到了1985年，一套租用制度建立起来了。

sentences.english: Yvette is now paying more than when she was renting. Is this a problem?
sentences.chinese: 伊薇特现付更多的时候她是租用比。

sentences.english: Commercial tenants in the building are mindful of their energy costs.
sentences.chinese: 租用大厦的商户们很注意他们的能源消耗。

sentences.english: He was at once conducted to the best room in the hotel, which Dolohov had taken for the occasion.
sentences.chinese: 他立刻被人领到多洛霍夫于是夜租用的上等客房里去。

sentences.english: The picnickers hired some warm clothes for a trip up the mountain top.
sentences.chinese: 旅行人为登山顶而租用一些保暖衣服。

sentences.english: They are renting a furnished flat.
sentences.chinese: 他们租用了一套带有家具的公寓房子。

sentences.english: Must work with Work For Hire and NDA agreement.
sentences.chinese: 必须与有关租用和NDA协定的工作。

sentences.english: Offer various middle- and low-grade cars and microbuses for citizen to rent.
sentences.chinese: 我公司备有各种中低档轿车，面包车，可供市民租用。

sentences.english: Laotian villages, without electricity, rent solar energy panels for a weekend.
sentences.chinese: 老挝没有电力的村庄周末租用太阳能电池板。

sentences.english: A lending contact is an agreement between a lessor and a lessee.
sentences.chinese: 租赁契约是出租人和承租人之间达成的租用协议。

sentences.english: Rental cars are available on Friday Harbor via M&W Auto.
sentences.chinese: 在星期五港湾，你可以向M&W公司租用汽车。

sentences.english: Hundreds of cellars and air-raid shelters are being rented out as living spaces in the Chinese capital.
sentences.chinese: 在北京，许多人租用地下室和防空洞作为栖身之所。

sentences.english: You can rent a bicycle if you want to get some exercise.
sentences.chinese: 如果你想锻炼身体，可以租用一辆自行车。

sentences.english: This performance receives support from the Leisure and Cultural Services Department's reduction of Hire Charges Scheme.
sentences.chinese: 本节目获得康乐及文化事务署减收租用费计划资助。

sentences.english: Your job is to make sure you are hiring the right people to complete your home.
sentences.chinese: 你的工作是要确定你是租用权人完成你的家。

sentences.english: Why is colocation more expensive then getting a server.
sentences.chinese: 为什么美国服务器租用比托管费用便宜很多？

definition: to hire/to rent/to charter/to rent out/to lease out/rent/land tax
borrower/leaser/the hiring side of a contract
to lend/to put out a loan
to leave sth unused/to lie idle
